jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Have a strong sense of collaboration with stakeholders both internal and external with definitive outcomes 
● Own client relationships to gain tangible, incremental value outcomes. Achieve revenue growth targets for your key clients or accounts and ensure high retention by driving working with product marketing, product and tech teams to have tailored solutions and offerings for your clients 
● Deep understanding and relationships to navigate through the media buying houses and creative agencies to be able to influence and acquire strong partners 
● Strong commercial acumen 
● Provide regular succinct updates to senior management of the program’s progress

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• 6 to 8 years professional qualifying experience with a proven track record in account management, client facing and quota-carrying experience
  • Strong communication, persuasion and influencing skills
  • Strong business acumen and commercial mindset in interacting with stakeholders.
  • Business level fluency in both Bahasa and English
  • Experience an Account Manager, Associate Business Partner of Business Director at the top leading media agencies in Indonesia
